title: Filter blocks
description: The filter blocks that are contained in a filter for a building scene layer.

id.description: Unique identifier of the filter block.

filterMode.description: Filter mode defines how features are drawn. For example, the filter mode of a filter can be wire frame.

filterExpression.description: Filter query expression for a building scene layer.

filterAuthoringInfo.description: Authoring info used to generate user interface for authoring clients.
